languages.text: "Твои попытки устрашить меня столь же бесплодны, как и ложь, что сочится из твоих уст. Лишь милость Домин отделяет мой клинок от твоего горла, нелюдь".

traits.locale_text: "Твои попытки устрашить меня столь же бесплодны, как и ложь, что сочится из твоих уст. Лишь милость Домин отделяет мой клинок от твоего горла, нелюдь".

languages.text: "Your attempts to intimidate me are as hollow as the lies seeping from your lips. Only the Domin's grace stands between my blade and your throat, xenos."
languages.original_text: "Твои попытки устрашить меня столь же бесплодны, как и ложь, что сочится из твоих уст. Лишь милость Домин отделяет мой клинок от твоего горла, нелюдь".

traits.locale_text: "Your attempts to intimidate me are as hollow as the lies seeping from your lips. Only the Domin's grace stands between my blade and your throat, xenos."
"Your attempts to intimidate me are as hollow as the lies seeping from your lips. Only the Domin's grace stands between my blade and your throat, xenos."

"Your attempts to intimidate me are as hollow as the lies seeping from your lips. Only the Domin's grace stands between my blade and your throat, xenos."

languages.text: «Tus intentos de intimidarme están tan vacíos como las mentiras que brotan de tu boca. Solo la merced de{mf|l| la} Domin se interpone entre mi hoja y tu garganta, xenos».
languages.original_text: "Your attempts to intimidate me are as hollow as the lies seeping from your lips. Only the Domin's grace stands between my blade and your throat, xenos."

traits.locale_text: «Tus intentos de intimidarme están tan vacíos como las mentiras que brotan de tu boca. Solo la merced de{mf|l| la} Domin se interpone entre mi hoja y tu garganta, xenos».

languages.text: 「我を威嚇しようとしても、その唇からしみ出る嘘と同じように虚しい。我が刃とお前の喉の間に立ちはだかるのはドミンの恩寵しかない、異種族よ」
languages.original_text: "Your attempts to intimidate me are as hollow as the lies seeping from your lips. Only the Domin's grace stands between my blade and your throat, xenos."

traits.locale_text: 「我を威嚇しようとしても、その唇からしみ出る嘘と同じように虚しい。我が刃とお前の喉の間に立ちはだかるのはドミンの恩寵しかない、異種族よ」

languages.text: “你对我的恐吓，就像你嘴里渗出的谎言一样空洞无力。我的利刃之所以还没割断你的喉咙，不过是因为秘者对你的恩典罢了，异形。”
languages.original_text: "Your attempts to intimidate me are as hollow as the lies seeping from your lips. Only the Domin's grace stands between my blade and your throat, xenos."

traits.locale_text: “你对我的恐吓，就像你嘴里渗出的谎言一样空洞无力。我的利刃之所以还没割断你的喉咙，不过是因为秘者对你的恩典罢了，异形。”

languages.text: "Eure Versuche, mich einzuschüchtern, sind ebenso hohl wie die Worte, die über Eure Lippen kommen. Allein die Gnade {mf|des|der} Domin steht zwischen meiner Klinge und Eurer Kehle, Xenos."
languages.original_text: "Your attempts to intimidate me are as hollow as the lies seeping from your lips. Only the Domin's grace stands between my blade and your throat, xenos."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Versuche, mich einzuschüchtern, sind ebenso hohl wie die Worte, die über Eure Lippen kommen. Allein die Gnade {mf|des|der} Domin steht zwischen meiner Klinge und Eurer Kehle, Xenos."

languages.text: « Vos tentatives de m'intimider sont aussi vaines que les mensonges qui se déversent de vos lèvres. Seule la grâce {mf|du Domin|de la Domin} se dresse entre ma lame et votre gorge, xénos. »
languages.original_text: "Your attempts to intimidate me are as hollow as the lies seeping from your lips. Only the Domin's grace stands between my blade and your throat, xenos."

traits.locale_text: « Vos tentatives de m'intimider sont aussi vaines que les mensonges qui se déversent de vos lèvres. Seule la grâce {mf|du Domin|de la Domin} se dresse entre ma lame et votre gorge, xénos. »

languages.text: "Gözümü korkutma çabaların, dudaklarından yayılan yalanlar gibi boş. Kılıcımla boğazın arasındaki tek engel, Domin'in merhametidir zeno."
languages.original_text: "Your attempts to intimidate me are as hollow as the lies seeping from your lips. Only the Domin's grace stands between my blade and your throat, xenos."
